name: Cyberilla
description:
Poachers have kidnapped your fellow apes and left them in cages.

Only you, a gorilla cyborg can save them and defeat The Monstrosity.

Controls:

WASD / Arrow Keys to move

Jump while touching poacher to send them flying

This is the first game I've ever made, so please feel free to comment. Thanks!

P.S. I know there's lots of bugs and some mechanics could have been better, but just pretend they're features. :)
